triple_sequences.action_description: Percent-encodes bytes for use in URL
Deserializes JSON string to Python object
Path object and status operations (creating Path objects, retrieving file status)
Checks if process is running with administrator privileges

triple_sequences.object: query_external, query_type="details", user=user, source=source, tag_name=tag_name, tag=tag, tag_classification=qp["tag_classification"], limit=qp["limit"], timeout=qp["max_timeout"]

triple_sequences.action_description: Reads all bytes from process standard output
Serializes Python object to JSON string
